column4: does  is there any link to get .deb files for ubuntu packs dvd
what software are you looking for?
do you need the operating system on cd/dvd? See the shop: http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu
how would anyone know what collection you want on such a dvd?
other than creating it yourselves... (like what ikonia said)
as I told you, you cannot just have a part of the repository.
no, that's not how the repos work
please elaborate. Explain what it is that you want to accomplish
sure, no one will stop you from doing that
but probably few will help you if you do
you may want to join one of the development or kernel channels on irc.
